name: volume_fraction_of_oxygen_in_sea_floor_sediment_pore_water
description: "Volume fraction" is used in the construction "volume_fraction_of_X_in_Y", where X is a material constituent of Y. It is evaluated as the volume of X divided by the volume of Y (including X). It may be expressed as a fraction, a percentage, or any other dimensionless representation of a fraction.  "Sea floor sediment" is sediment deposited at the sea bed. "Water" means water in all phases.
